table.name: crm_form
table.comment: Defines a form. Initially, pre-load with 1 'built-in' form - Contact which acts as 'parent' for the custom forms added by users.

field.name: name
field.comment: Variable name/programmatic handle for this property.

field.name: style
field.comment: Visual relationship between this form and its parent.

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before fields in form.

field.name: help_post
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after fields in form.
